episodes.title: Former Jehovah's Witness On Growing Up In The Cult & What It Took To Leave
episodes.description: In our brand new DEEP series we interview fascinating people who have lived unique lives. In this episode we talked to Ali Millar, author and a former Jehovah's Witness, who told us about the religious organisation methods and system, what was her childhood and teenage years there like and how and why she has made a decision to leave. Thanks to Ali for taking part!You can follow her at https://www.instagram.com/ali__millar/ and read more of her story in her book 'The Last Days' https://amzn.eu/d/1aIG48EWelcome to DEEP - a brand new channel that brings you incredible people with amazing stories from all over the world.If you've seen the team's previous work - Minutes With/The Gap/Agree To Disagree...then you know what to expect!Let us know if there's anyone in particular you think we should speak to - we love bringing you stories and want to hear what you like.Thanks and we hope you enjoy - from Maryana, Thom, Ben, Danny, Bryony and Amelia. Interview by Maryana
